summary: Zie's Kitchen app with ongoing enhancements for cashier transaction handling.

existing_features.title: Add a transaction date selector to the Cashier (Kasir) page so the cashier can choose a past date when saving a transaction, defaulting to today.
Update React Query hooks and types used by the Kasir page so the create-transaction mutation sends the selected transaction date to the backend and triggers the same cache invalidations as before.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow cashier to save/create transactions dated from previous days (backdated transactions).
Update the backend transaction model and APIs so a cashier can save a transaction with an explicit transaction date/time from a previous day (backdated), instead of always using the current time.
Update daily/monthly reporting logic so backdated transactions are included in the correct day and month based on the transaction date selected by the cashier.
